category: Sports Fair Committee Regulations/Article 10 (Urgent Business Processing)
contents: Article 10 (Urgent Business Processing) Committee meetings shall be held face-to-face in principle. However, if the content of the matters to be deliberated by the committee is deemed minor or urgent, the chairperson may substitute a written resolution for the committee's resolution. However, when the majority of the members request to formally refer the matter to the committee, this must be followed. Revised 2022. 1. 24.
